gen:link.label:label: BV723: The item "Technical provisions calculated as a whole (non-life excluding health)" in template S.02.01 - Balance sheet should be equal to technical provisions calculated as a whole without transitory measures plus the corresponding amount of transitory measures reported in template S.17.01 - Non-life technical provisions. -->Template 1: S.02.01; Template 2: S.17.01; Expression: {S.02.01, r0530,c0010}={S.17.01, r0010,c0050}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0060}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0070}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0080}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0090}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0100}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0110}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0120}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0130}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0150}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0160}+{S.17.01, r0010,c0170}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0050}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0060}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0070}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0080}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0090}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0100}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0110}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0120}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0130}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0150}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0160}+{S.17.01, r0290,c0170}
